```{r load_data, echo=FALSE}
data=read.xlsx("SOC_ALL_results_276_Final_252.xlsx", sheet=7)
data$count<-1
# plot(data)
```

We loaded the data to compare SOC in the top 15 cm and the top 100cm.

```{r plot_data, echo=FALSE}
model<-log(data$Total)~log(data$C015)
plot(model,pch=16)+
abline(lm(model),lwd=2)
```

```{r analyse_data, echo=FALSE}
summary(lm(model))
```
```{r analyse_data, echo=FALSE}
plot(lm(model)$resid)
```
